name: Violent Misfire, Greater
components: V, S, M (a small piece of flint)
target: one early or advanced firearm/level, no two of which can be more than 30 ft. apart
text: This spell functions as violent misfire except as noted above.
target_zh: 每CL一把早期或近代火器，其中任意火器彼此距离不能超过30尺以上。
savingThrow_zh: 意志, 通过则无效 (物体)
text_zh: 该法术的功能除了上述外均如同爆裂哑火（VIOLENT MISFIR）。
